mapper.insert: insert into Po (id, user, totalQty, totalPrice, status, createBy, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalqty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update Po set user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalQty = #{totalqty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user, totalQty, totalPrice, status, createBy, createTime from Po
